Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Boston in 1970...
Injured on 6/15/1971 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Released by Boston on 5/5/1975...
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Texas in 1978...
Injured on 8/25/1978 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 7/10/1980 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Moose Haas (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1984, off Luis Aponte (MIN)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 8/18/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1985, hitting .423 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 9/6/1985...
Injured on 9/16/1985 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1986, hitting .500 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Boston on 7/9/1986...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 7/9/1986...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Baltimore on 8/21/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1989, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
